description: Running into issues? Don't worry—most problems have simple solutions. Find quick fixes for common issues and get back to collecting great reviews.

key_features.title: Quick Issue Search
key_features.description: Find solutions to your specific problems with our searchable troubleshooting guide.

key_features.title: Step-by-Step Fixes
key_features.description: Clear, actionable solutions for the most common issues and technical problems.

key_features.title: Email Delivery Help
key_features.description: Resolve email delivery issues and improve your review request success rates.

key_features.title: QR Code Troubleshooting
key_features.description: Fix QR code scanning issues and ensure customers can easily access your prompt pages.

key_features.title: Contact Import Solutions
key_features.description: Resolve common problems when importing your customer database or contact lists.

key_features.title: Account & Setup Support
key_features.description: Get help with login issues, profile updates, and account configuration problems.

how_it_works.title: Identify Your Issue
how_it_works.description: Use our search function or browse categories to find the specific problem you're experiencing.

how_it_works.title: Try Quick Fixes
how_it_works.description: Start with our most common solutions like refreshing your browser or checking settings.

how_it_works.title: Follow Step-by-Step Solutions
how_it_works.description: Work through our detailed troubleshooting steps specific to your issue category.

how_it_works.title: Contact Support if Needed
how_it_works.description: If the issue persists, contact our support team with the steps you've already tried.

best_practices.title: Start with Happy Customers
best_practices.description: Focus on customers who had positive experiences. They're more likely to leave glowing reviews and help troubleshoot issues.

best_practices.title: Perfect Your Timing
best_practices.description: Send review requests when the experience is fresh but not overwhelming - typically 1-3 days after service completion.

best_practices.title: Personalize Every Request
best_practices.description: Use specific details about each customer's experience in your review requests to improve response rates.

best_practices.title: Keep Your Data Clean
best_practices.description: Regularly update contact information and remove invalid email addresses to maintain high deliverability rates.
